attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: we the undersigned party for the knighthood of Anthony Sutherland for his outstanding contrabution to the advancement of the human race with no thought about the harm and welfare to himself and those close to him.So "PLEASE" Prime Minister Tony Blair, or if youve gone by then, Prime Minister Gordon Brown,grant this wish and lead the way in restoring the heart and the faith of the british people at home and abroad.( thank you for your time)

rejection.details: You need to put spaces into the title of the petition.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
